Question: Current Backyard, LLC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Current Backyard, LLC

Product: Current Model G Dual-Zone Electric Grill

- First-of-its-kind outdoor electric grill with fully Wi-Fi enabled cooking system
- Preheats in 10 minutes, heating up to 700 degrees for max searing temperature
- Dual-zone flexibility for independent right and left cooking zones
- Features SmartClean mode, meat probes, and app integration for seamless cooking experience
- Offers a best-in-class consumer experience with app-guided setup, tool-less assembly, and customizable platform
- Retail price: $899

Additional Product: Current Model G Electric Griddle

- Heats up to 600 degrees with Auto-Seasoning setting
- Complete Wi-Fi control and app integration for foolproof results
- Offers best-in-class consumer experience and customizable platform
- Retail price: $799

Both products will be on display at CES 2024 and are set to start shipping to consumers in February 2024.
Summary_cn:
当前庭院有限责任公司

产品：Current Model G 双区电动烧烤炉

- 首款配备完全Wi-Fi启动系统的户外电动烧烤炉
- 10分钟预热，最高烧烤温度可达700度
- 双区灵活性，独立的右侧和左侧烹饪区
- 配备智能清洁模式，肉类探针和应用集成，实现无缝烹饪体验
- 提供最佳消费体验，具备应用引导安装、无需工具组装和可定制平台功能
- 零售价格：899美元

附加产品：Current Model G 电动煎烤盘

- 最高可加热到600度，并具备自动上油设置
- 完全Wi-Fi控制和应用集成，确保简单上手的结果
- 提供最佳消费体验和可定制平台功能
- 零售价格：799美元

这两款产品将在2024年国际消费电子展（CES）上展示，并计划于2024年2月开始向消费者发货。
